name: Perfect Thief Chase 3D
description:
Perfect Thief Chase 3D is one of the best game among all the police chasing thief games. You are the city police officer who is chasing and smashing the city thieves. All the thieves, criminals, law breakers and offenders are taking over your city. And destroying your city peace. Ride extremely practical cop car to run after the law breakers and smash into the thief's escaping car to catch them to complete the mission and the capture.
thief chase game has a lot of interesting gameplay time, ride on all sides in a big open wide city. Wipe the streets from street racers in this game. With a lot of thrilling and exciting missions and divergent tasks to clear you will have a lot of fun. How are your insane driving skills in multiple cop cars in a huge and great city? A massive city also means the roads have too much of traffic, sometimes this makes capturing the suspects a challenging task.
